name: PARTY HOUSE SIMULATOR
description:
You threw a party last night and now your landlord is on his way. You must race against the clock to clean the house.

====CONTROLS====

WForwardALeftSDownDRightRThrow CansMouseLook Around

The player can hold up to 32 cans.

The mop can clean up to 5 mud spots before it needs to be washed in the bucket.
